text:
Hey everyone :wave:

Sorry, I wasn't active in slack for quite a while.
The Russian invasion of my country:angry:, hence the electricity shortage and a lack of stable internet connection, made it harder to stay in touch.

But I'm back now with some news to share! :yum:

At <https://kohorta.co/|Kohorta>, we have been working hard on our newest product â€“ <https://voice.kohorta.co/|Voice>, and I am proud to announce that Voice is now <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/marketing/cms/voice-223120|available on the HubSpot Marketplace>.

With Voice, you can make your blog more accessible and engaging by providing AI-generated audio versions of your posts. This allows people to listen to your content when it is not convenient to read, decreasing the number of visitors leaving the page.

You can try Voice for free and see how it works for you.
